description:
Memory for Kids improves on the classic formula of memory games. It allows you to increase the difficulty level at your own pace and customize the challenges to your liking. 

Our brains are the most important tools of the 21st century. Do your child a favor and give them a gift that will help them realize their full potential.

Key features:

- Improves memory
- Cute cards
- Adjustable difficulty level
- Relaxing music
- 20 card designs
- 18 difficulty levels
name: Memory for Kids
